shortdesc.i: Returns the information of current system font, which is composed of the font family and font size.

dd.p: Returns the JavaScript Object that contains fontFamily and fontSize properties.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">
// Check system font information
var fontInfo = blackberry.system.getFontInfo();
alert("The font family of current system font is " + fontInfo.fontFamily + "\n" + "The size of current system font is " + fontInfo.fontSize);
</script>
